name: Test Takeover Fails with OTP Bound to Different Payer
description: OTP bound to payer1 should not work for payer2
descriptionHtml: OTP bound to payer1 should not work for payer2
statusMessage:
AssertionError: Expected 400/404 for OTP bound to another payer, got 201: 
assert 201 in (400, 404)
 +  where 201 = <Response [201]>.status_code

labels.name: story
labels.value: Takeover fails because of OTP bound to different payer
